channel.title: Burnout Legends
channel.description:
Title: Burnout Legends
Genre-- Racing
Age(3+)
Review-This game is very much like the old burnout's that came before this one. Basically what you have to do is have lots of races in four different catogories(Crash, Time attack, Pursuit, and i forgot the other one)
Ups--ex...Good Music, Fast gameplay, Good graphics.
Downs-- No free roam mode
System Info --PS2, XBOX, PSP
Thanks
Hope this helps
:)

item.title: Burnout Legends
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

The psp version was really good!
It was almost exactly the same as the old games (not including the tracks) but it was still fun and I played it for aaages until I lost it
